process

  • process(result: WorkflowCompileResult): Process<{ compilations: Project.LoadCompile.Compilation[]; contracts: Project.LoadCompile.Contract[] }>
    • Defined in packages/db/src/project/loadCompile/index.ts:51

    For a compilation result from @truffle/workflow-compile/new, generate a sequence of GraphQL requests to submit to Truffle DB

    Returns a generator that yields requests to forward to Truffle DB. When calling .next() on this generator, pass any/all responses and ultimately returns nothing when complete.

    Parameters

    • result: WorkflowCompileResult

    Returns Process<{ compilations: Project.LoadCompile.Compilation[]; contracts: Project.LoadCompile.Contract[] }>
